description:
ADOBE LIGHTROOM – START EDITING PHOTOS LIKE A PRO

  • MORE THAN 390 STUDENTS HAVE ENROLLED ALREADY
  • Over 80 Lightroom Lessons " Edit photo's like a pro"
  • 6+ 5 Star Reviews from a really happy & satisfied student
  • No Prior Lightroom knowledge needed "Guaranteed"
  • Full & free lifetime access to the complete course
  • All future & additional lectures will always be free of charge
  • No illustrator or other software is needed "You only need Lightroom".
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!

ARE YOU STRUGGLING WITH ADOBE LIGHTROOM?

  • AND WANT TO LEARN IT EASILY AND INSTANTLY?
  • AND WANT TO KNOW ALL THE IN AND OUT'S?
  • AND WITH NO PRIOR LIGHTROOM KNOWLEDGE!

--------------------------- " Then this course is for you " -------------------------------

What This Course Entails:

I will teach you how to get into Adobe Lightroom from A to Z, so don't worry if you don't have prior experience with Lightroom. Follow my lead and I'll teach you to be good at it! “Guaranteed"

All my Lightroom instructions form part of a comprehensive guide that can help you to accomplish your goals by applying these skills. During the lesson you get to eavesdrop as I work, giving you some insight as to how I work and what I do.

The idea is to teach you how to use and work with Adobe Lightroom "Anyone can do it, you just need to know the simple steps! "

Whether you have previous experience with Lightroom or not, it doesn't matter. Apply your knowledge for half an hour a day and you could be making huge improvements or even extra cash, just like me.

"And I'm not kidding when I say that you need nothing but Lightroom!"

All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free. Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!

You'll learn:

  1. How to work with Lightroom " Getting Started"
  2. How to work with the library module
  3. You will learn how to work with Develop module & Tools
  4. You will learn creative editing techniques in the library module
  5. You will learn how to work with Map module
  6. You will learn how to work with Book module
  7. You will learn how to work with Slideshow module
  8. You will learn how to work with Print module
  9. You will learn how to work with Web module
  10. You will learn how to use Lightroom - Shortcuts & Tips & Tricks
  11. You will learn how to export your images & save all
  12. You will learn how to work with the complete lightroom interface - Become a advanced lightroom user
  13. You will learn all necessary fundamentals of lightroom
  14. Teaching you different develop " EDITING " methods
  15. You will learn how to do different develop methods "Techniques"

... and much, much more!

Intrigued yet? Then keep reading!

As with all my courses: the initial low price will increase after time. This one is currently $80 and it will soon upgrade to $99 so join in now! "You will have unlimited lifetime access at no extra cost" Not just that; all future additional lectures, bonuses, etc in this course are always free.

There's an unconditional, no-questions-asked full 30-day money-back guarantee! I'm known for always offering support in Udemy, so feel free to shout out if you're stuck or need assistance. "I'm here to help"

One final note:

My goal is to teach you Adobe Lightroom from A to Z, so don't stress about not having worked in Ligghtroom before. "I do my best to make it simple, fun & informative"

I've crammed all my Lightroom knowledge into over 80+ Lightroom lessons!

After going through this course you'll be able to apply your new Lightroom skills to edit anything and make some extra cash along the way.

All you have to do is click on the "take this course" button on the top right corner. You have nothing to lose. In fact, you've got a lot to gain.

Thank you, Manni
title: Learning Adobe Lightroom - Start Editing Photos Like a Pro
